name: telegram-mini-app-game
description: Telegram Mini App Game with subscriptions

scripts.build: pnpm --filter game-core build && pnpm --filter web-ui build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.pnpm:install: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.12.0 --activate && pnpm install
scripts.pnpm:dev: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.12.0 --activate && pnpm dev
scripts.pnpm:build: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@9.12.0 --activate && pnpm build
